text:
You look great in it,
Koito!
Ah, you could step on stage right away in it.

It might still be a bit early to step on stage...
Maybe we need more practice...
W-We need to practice more before that...

Haha, yeah.
Let's work hard on our practice.

...Yes.
I'll make sure not to be overshadowed by this costume.

I want to be able to say
I'm also a member of 283PRO.
We need to keep working hard, right...?
